content:
Right now the Argonaut profile references SNOMED 160244002 for NKA, which is no longer active. Should this now reference 716186003?

http://www.fhir.org/guides/argonaut/r2/ValueSet-substance.html

Yes...need to discuss when to do a new Argonaut release....US-core is almost published, do you want to create a gForge ticket and assign to Eric :) We can vote on Tuesdays US Realm SC call. I will be out on vacation!
No need for a ticket already a GForge by Rob Hausam. Its been applied already there. I will create an issue #70 for Argonaut.

Is there an ETA on when we can expect to see the update for Argonaut?
https://github.com/argonautproject/implementation-program/issues/70
I have a bit of a backlog @Brett Marquard ?
hmm...no timeline is set for an update to Argonaut DSTU2 is set. Would others be interested in a 'minor' release?
yes I would be - very soon I need to cut an R4 version of argonaut. would like it to be as up to date as possible before having a shot at that

Just to clarify the discussion, US-Core (STU3 based) contains the entire scope of and is more up to date than Argonaut Data Query (DSTU2 based). The question that Michelle asked was about updates to Argonaut Data Query (DSTU2 based). Any R4 versions (whether is called US-Core or Argonaut ) should in my opinion be based upon US-Core.
